    Package Description
    com.facebook  
    com.facebook.internal
    com.facebook.internal is solely for the use of other packages within the Facebook SDK for Android.
    com.facebook.widget  

    • Uses of FacebookDialog.PendingCall in com.facebook

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void UiLifecycleHelper.trackPendingDialogCall(FacebookDialog.PendingCall pendingCall)
      Register that we are expecting results from a call to the Facebook application (e.g., from a native dialog provided by the Facebook app).

      Called when the user completes interacting with a Facebook dialog.
      void FacebookDialog.Callback.onError(FacebookDialog.PendingCall pendingCall, Exception error, android.os.Bundle data)
      Called if an error occurred while presenting a Facebook dialog.
